title: Can someone explain the "Hextech Mystery Champion" in the BE store
body:
Specifically:
1. What happens if you have all the champs?
2. Can it be saved and used for later champ releases?

replies.body:
I believe you can still get those shards since they can be used in ranking up champion mastery, but it might not be the best idea since you risk losing a lot of essence should you get someone you already have =\ . 

I'm not 100% sure about saving the tokens for later, but I'm willing to bet that they would only give you champs that were available at the time when you bought the token.

It says they are actual champions not shards, or am i missing something?  I was under the impression it is a mystery champion not a mystery champion shard.  I am probably wrong, but my thoughts were to buy and use later as I don't need any champs right now. 

Is there somewhere where these are explained on their website?

Yea I was totally thinking of a different item. That one, in particular, does grant a champion permanent, and a shard if you unlock everyone already. Yesterday was a blur of rewards questions so I must have been going a weeeeee bit too fast, sorry 'bout that fam XD

Any chance we could persuade you to find out? :P

Yeeaaaaa looks like this item got some heavy changes recently without any forewarning going out....

https://i.gyazo.com/fe95abd15c32cecee4861f9672f66b10.png

Oh what the hell!? Is there any way we can get compensated for that if we already opened them? I bought 3 of them and already opened them. I only had 3 champions worth less than 3950 in my unpurchased pool.....I got 2 of them :( I actually lost blue essence by buying these random champs

So basically we got screwed...
If i had known I could save them I would have purchased them.  So now if i had had a CLEAR explanation on here or the store I could have prebought a few champs.  I keep finding more reasons to be pissed off and not spend anymore money on the game.  I want the chance to prebuy like everyone else got.  Kinda BS to let some take advantage but not others.  

So did riot convert the ones in everyone's inventory to shards/champs or are they still mystery shards that can be used later?
